Package com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App

Class SecondFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.K05.Mais_Maze_Android_App.SecondFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class SecondFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
This Fragment is displayed when starting the game and thus handles all the preparation and executions associated with running the game itself.

    • onCreateView

      public android.view.View onCreateView(@NonNull android.view.LayoutInflater inflater, android.view.ViewGroup container, android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      This method defines what should happen as the view is being created
      Overrides:
      onCreateView in class androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      Parameters:
      inflater - The LayoutInflater object that can be used to inflate any views in the fragment,
      container - If non-null, this is the parent view that the fragment's UI should be attached to. The fragment should not add the view itself, but this can be used to generate the LayoutParams of the view.
      savedInstanceState - If non-null, this fragment is being re-constructed from a previous saved state as given here.
      Returns:
      the root of this fragment's view

    • startGameLoop

      public void startGameLoop(String steeringMethod)
      This method starts the game-loop
      Parameters:
      steeringMethod - the chosen steering method. Can be set to either "ESP32" or "Phone"

    • onDestroyView

      public void onDestroyView()
      This method defines what should happen whenever the Fragment's view is destroyed. It makes sure to stop and join threads, disconnect clients from the broker and stop sensors.
      Overrides:
      onDestroyView in class androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
